title: any plans for a module-loader?
body:
by **gorgonzola@online.de**: 
hello

i found the stuff under "debug" in the packages but did not read it all
yet. however, there seems to exist binary loading and parsing capabilities
in there. i didn't see a runtime-linking capability though. my question is
if you have plans to enhance the given support to implement module-loading
like in compiz or abiword?
